title: Did Pelosi Offer to Drop Impeachment in Exchange for Full Immigrant Amnesty?
subtitle: To date, U.S. Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi has not embraced the idea of attempting to impeach President Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: U.S. Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi offered to drop impeachment proceedings against President Donald Trump in exchange for legislation giving amnesty to all undocumented immigrants in the United States.
